pullrequest.title: Update to starting pen and lighting in task 2

content.raw:
From a black box perspective (not reviewing physics factors): starting pen looks ok to me, and light produces reasonable shadows on robot camera images.

I'm sure you already took into account the Impact on the computer vision algorithms.
content.html:
From a black box perspective (not reviewing physics factors): starting pen looks ok to me, and light produces reasonable shadows on robot camera images.

I'm sure you already took into account the Impact on the computer vision algorithms.
